This game somehow manages to bring so much frustration and joy at the same time.

Balance:
I think it is good to keep in mind when thinking about playing, that the developers DO NOT care about balancing for a competitive format. At the end of the day, no matter how serious some people take it, this is a CASUAL game. Personally, I would like the killer to be more viable against pre-made groups, but as it stands, any good 3-4 man will wipe the floor with the killer. The game has it's fair share of problems as well. Sound issues, bugs, balancing, and probably the worst part - TOXIC PLAYERS. That being said if you can get past the Killers spamming "Gen Rushers and Keys" and the Survivors crying about "Camping, Tunneling, Moris, NOED, ect.", you can have ton's of fun with this game. This does not mean there aren't some amazing people that play this game, because there are and I have met many down to earth and chill people. 


Community:
I think one of the biggest factor is the fact that the ranking system doesn't properly reflect skill. Rank 1 is the highest and represents nearly 10% of the player base which leads to a HUGE variation of skill in the top ranks. This generally tends to lead to egos built up by players with no real outlet to judge their skills - aka EVERYONE THINKS THEY ARE A GOD. I even think that that is ok as long as you are having fun. Just don't let that get to you and play how you want. If you want to play Killer or Survivor a certain "scummy" way because it is fun for you, just do it! HAVE FUN! Don't let the predetermined metas and whiny player base control how you play the game.

If these are things you can get over, I highly recommend this game to anyone who like asymmetrical horrors. It currently is the king of the genre right now and offers a ton of variety whether you play as the Killer or Survivor. Be warned, it is a grind and potentially can be costly to get the right set of perks that you want. While you can unlock most stuff freely, it will take a decent amount of time to do so. I recommend playing both Killer and Survivor equally when starting off to get the feel on how each side plays, learn the map tiles (as maps are semi random but are built on set tiles where you will see patterns), and just have a good time!

Muy buen juego, diseño que no habia visto antes , y la verdad que con una idea bastante original.
El juego es entretenido y un poco complicado de aprender, pero el progreso es obvio , aunque nos tengamos que regir por ciertas habilidades que son casi "necesarias" para sobrevivir, las builds mas exoticas no suelen funcionar muy bien.
La musica del juego es perfecta y se nota el trabajo que le pusieron , hay mucha musica personalizada sobre todo para los asesinos que denota no solo la cercania sino a veces incluso de que personaje se trata que nos esta intentando matar.
El problema principal del juego son los bugs, pero el equipo trabaja bastante en arreglarlos.
Definitivamente es un juego que deberian comprar si quieren divertirse, solo o con amigos es un must buy. Aparte ahora con el crossplay pueden jugar con gente de otras plataformas, si tienen algun amigo en play que lo agarro con ps plus

I really enjoy Dead by Daylight and while it's a multiplayer game and meant to be played with friends, I can still have fun even if I'm just playing by myself. Despite the gameplay being repetitive and designed to have just a few main tasks in order to survive or sacrifice, (depending on if you are playing as either the survivor or the killer) it is a very addicting game that you can play for hours on end. The gameplay is also simple and straightforward. DbD also has pretty good character designs for both killers and survivors and has good music along with having an appropriate atmosphere for an online horror game. DLC is also pretty cool albeit a little pricy but I guess that's because of all the licensing. My only real complaint is the servers; I have the game on both PS4 and PC and load times are very long on both systems.

The recent graphics update makes this game at par with current ones even if the engine is 4 years old, It's just one of those games you come back for gameplay and the devs have done a good job of keeping things interesting with new content.

I have been forced to change my review from Thumbs Up to Thumbs Down because this game game me soo many flaws everyday. Every time I play this game I face one issue. Maybe when I rated this game positive it deserved a thumbs up but now it has proved me wrong. The list is long why i don't recommend this game but i'll mention some of them :-

1) The matchmaking has no point in this game. It's really just Numbers and a thing to "SHOW OFF". Me being a level 12 killer play with Red Ranked survivors.
2) Such a glitchy game for such a simple and non-complex maps. Consider highly complex maps in games like CS:GO, Valorant or any other game and still manages to give better gameplay than this crapy maps.
3) Every time a new DLC is hyped it's same crappy New, killer New Map( Which is full of bugs and glitches at launch; Therefore, Disabled ) Basically it's money grab for Devs. Nothing new nothing interesting.
4) Playing for a long time I have realized 4 Vs 1 can never be balanced. So, it's an unbalanced game even if devs can do nothing about it. So not fun.
5) No Balancing is done properly If a perk is nerfed it basically becomes useless ( DS )
and if a perk is buffed its the most OP thing and the next Meta Perk that everyone starts using ( franklin's demise )
The list can goo on trust me not worth the actual price buy only if you get like 80 % off in sale and play this game for fun only.

とてもおすすめできるゲームであるとは全く言えません。まず民度がとても低いです。一番おすすめできない理由がこれになります。更にバグがとても多い。これにつきます。軽度のものならいいですが、キャラクターが動けなくなるバグなどの深刻なものがほぼ毎回発生し、修正アップデートが起こるとまたあらたなバグが誕生して・・・という繰り返しになります。
しかもサバイバーが不利になるバグはすぐに修正されるくせに、キラーが不利になるバグはいまだに修正されていないものもあります。
また根本のゲームバランスもかなりサバイバーに有利なバランスとなっており、キラーで勝利をするのはかなり大変になります。そこに加えて煽りがあると考えるとキラーはもう精神修行に他なりません。マッチングもクロスプレイで改善されてはいますがサバイバーは長く、キラーは一瞬という風な時間になっています。そのためサバイバーでは焚き木を眺めるゲームとなり、キラーでは上位のレベルになると１０秒ほどでマッチするなどの差があります。
まあでもマッチするならいいんでしょ？と考えている方に朗報です。このゲームではマッチングが崩壊していることが多々あります。下位レベルのキラーが上位レベルのサバイバー４人と戦わされたり、逆が起きたりが毎回のように起こります。適正ランク同士で戦えるのなんて稀です。しかも運営はサバイバー４人のうち２人が毎試合脱出することを目標としていることを宣言していますが、上位キラーではその結果になってしまうとランクは当然上がらず、現状維持すら困難な査定を受けます。どうしろってんだよおい。そしてパークというキャラクターにセットできる能力みたいなものもキラー側の最強パークがナーフを食らうことはあるものの、生存者側のパークは依然として強いままであったり、サバイバーに優しすぎます。結果勘違い上級者様がどんどん増えていき、その人たちが初心者キラーさんに煽りを行う負の連鎖が出来上がります。
正直結論としてはこのゲームに２０００円も出すのは大損です。セール中に１０００円ぐらいで買うか、フリープレイで遊ぶぐらいの方が全然いいと思います。とっととストライクも更にナーフしろ。破滅はナーフしたくせによぉ？？？

Unfortunately, after playing for quite a while, I cannot recommend this game to the general public.  Though there are several positives, I fear the problems and negatives that come with this game make it generally unpalatable to new players.

First, the pros:

1.  It's a novel idea and the best 4v1 game of its type out there (though most others are blatant copies of DbD).

2.  There are plenty of characters both survivor and killer to play as and master, and the perk system means the game offers hours and hours of playtime and progress.

3.  There are loads of cosmetics available for survivor and killer alike, and although some are flat-out recolors of the default costume, most are appealing and well thought-out (though the do require spending actual money).

And now for the cons:

1.  Having played survivor and killer more or less 50/50, I can say that the survivors are too powerful.  If the survivors have any idea what they're doing it can be borderline impossible to catch them in a chase before the others band together and knock out every generator on the map in 2.4 seconds.  Combine this with the huge number of crutch perks survivors have and playing killer can be a daunting task.  God help you if you're paired with a 4-man SWF group.

2.  The developers are extremely out-of-touch.  between game-breaking bugs and extremely unbalanced perks, I think I have seen a grand total of one change at least some people asked for (ruin being nerfed).  Other than that, the devs would rather introduce new killers/cosmetics and so on than fine-tune the ones in the game already to balance them well.

3.  The community in this game goes beyond toxic and into radioactive.  Aside from perhaps Mordhau, I have not seen a more toxic community; survivors regularly wait at exit gates to taunt killers, drop pallets and t-bag to taunt killers, rapidly click flashlights on and off, etc. and nearly always stick around to rub in a loss in the post-game chat (or complain about your choice of killer/perks if you win).  Racism, homophobia, etc. are rampant and reports almost never generate results.  After a while you learn to tune it out, but it is something to be aware of.

Overall, not an altogether bad game, but it has some SEVERE flaws that show no signs of being fixed.  It appeals to a very specific type of player, and you will likely hate it if you don't fit into its niche.

< 요약 >
> 사지마세요.
생존자 > 블러드 포인트 작하는 AI 살인마랑 10분 동안 시간 낭비하는 노잼 게임
장점 : 게임 때문에 화나지는 않음
단점 : 매치 대기 시간은 오래 걸리는데 대부분 AI 살인마(본인 경험)

살인마 > 인성질하는 생존마 때문에 스트레스로 혈압 오르는 게임
장점 : 매치 시간이 짧음, 못하거나 비등비등한 상대로는 재밌음
단점 : 하면 할수록 상위 랭크만 만나서 장점 사실상 실현 불가, 하면 할수록 스트레스

-----------------

살인마 기준으로 15 ~ 20 랭크 있을 때(낮을수록 고티어)는 그래도 비등비등하고 웬만하면 0킬은 없어서 괜찮다.

 그 이상으로 티어 올라가면서 생존자들 실력도 올라가고 이 떄 유튜브 보면서 필수 퍽 모으고 심리전 공부해서 10랭크 언저리  도달함.

이 때부터는 무조건 최상위 티어(1~4랭크)만 만나서 게임으로 받는 스트레스만 더 생겨서 게임 끔. 

철권은 못하면 혼자 연습이라도 되지 이겜은 인성질 당하면서 참고 해야 됨ㅋㅋㅋ

게임 조금씩만 하는 사람이면 저티어로 유지하니까 게임 할만 할듯.

할인 중인데 친구랑 잠깐 한두판 하는 정도 생각  > 구매 추천
할인 안하거나 게임 오래 할 생각 > 구매 비추천

If you are looking for a balanced game to play with your friends... you came to the right place! Sink a few hundred hours into a game with one clear and uncontested winner every single match. Its you! You always win when you are playing with friends (in the moral sense that is)! This is without a doubt the premier asymmetrical video game on steam. The patches come super frequently so bugs are nonexistent ;) Just remember that you read this thread after you round the 2 hour mark when you ask for a refund. The genre is horror so you wont realize it until its too late. Clipping, refresh rate, hitbox, turn speed and bbq. Get familiar with a can of ky, you will need it.
